title: Create DocumentHeader with metadata editing controls
description: Implement edit button, save/cancel buttons, and editing state in DocumentHeader.
design: File: src/components/Document/DocumentHeader/. Components: DocumentNavigation (navigation), edit button, save/cancel buttons. State: isEditing, hasUnsavedChanges. Show/hide edit mode.
acceptance_criteria: Edit button opens edit mode. Save/cancel buttons appear. Unsaved changes tracked. State managed correctly.

title: User Story 3: Rescan Workflows (Verification)
description:
Verify User Story 3 implementation is complete and working.

**Story Goal**: Users can rescan entire documents, individual pages, or custom page groups with different document types or OCR settings.

**Tasks**:
- T015: Manual acceptance test for whole PDF rescan
- T016: Manual acceptance test for custom grouping rescan
- T017: Verify rescan error handling

**Independent Test**: Open a document, open rescan modal, select grouping strategy and document type, submit rescan, verify new results.

**Current Implementation**: DocumentRescan modal with handler.ts functions for whole PDF, per-page, and custom grouping strategies.

title: Setup ESLint and Prettier with Husky pre-commit hooks
description: Configure code quality tools including ESLint with Airbnb config, Prettier for formatting, and Husky for pre-commit hooks.
design: Files: .eslintrc with Airbnb config, .prettierrc, .husky/pre-commit hook. Configure lint-staged to run prettier on changed files.
acceptance_criteria: ESLint runs without errors. Prettier formats code consistently. Pre-commit hooks enforce quality gates.

title: Configure Auth0 authentication
description: Set up Auth0 authentication with @auth0/nextjs-auth0. Configure environment variables and protect routes.
design: Install @auth0/nextjs-auth0@3.5.0. Add AUTH0_* variables to .env.local. Use withPageAuthRequired() HOC on pages.
acceptance_criteria: Unauthenticated users redirected to login. Authenticated users can access app. Token management works.

title: Update inline code documentation
description: Ensure all document processing components have clear JSDoc comments.
design: Review DocumentUploadDialog components for JSDoc comments. Review DocumentRescan components and handler for documentation. Review Document component table row detection logic for comments. Review TemplatelessApiV2Client methods for JSDoc. Add missing documentation where needed.
acceptance_criteria: All public methods and components have clear documentation.

title: Add document status tracking and display
description: Implement document status display and updates in DocumentTable.
design: Statuses: processing, done, confirmed, error. Display: Status icon in DocumentTable column. Color-coded: processing (blue), done (green), confirmed (dark green), error (red).
acceptance_criteria: Status displays correctly for each document. Icons color-coded. Status changes visible after refresh.

title: Verify reprocessDocument with different settings
description: Test reprocessing documents with different PDF conversion methods.
design: 1. Create a document. 2. Call reprocessDocument() with different pdfConversionMethod. 3. Verify pages are re-converted. 4. Verify scanAfterProcessing parameter works correctly. 5. Verify new results are generated.
acceptance_criteria: Reprocessing with different conversion methods works.

title: Manual acceptance test for upload workflow
description: Perform manual testing of the complete upload workflow to verify all acceptance scenarios.
design: 1. Navigate to document list page. 2. Click upload button - verify DocumentUploadDialog opens. 3. Drag PDF file onto drop zone - verify file is accepted and filename displayed. 4. Select Prompt from dropdown - verify selection is stored. 5. Click submit - verify uploadDocument() is called. 6. Verify document ID is returned. 7. Refresh document list - verify new document appears with "processing" status.
acceptance_criteria: All 5 acceptance scenarios pass. Issues documented with screenshots.

title: Implement field editing in ResultData
description: Add editable fields for correcting extracted values with validation.
design: Component: Editable TextField in FieldView. Features: Type-based validation (number, date, boolean). State: Track edited values. Save: updateDocument() with changes.
acceptance_criteria: Fields are editable. Validation applies to type. Changes persist on save.

title: Implement DocumentHeader with page navigation controls
description: Add navigation controls for page traversal (first, previous, next, last, jump to page).
design: File: src/components/Document/DocumentHeader/DocumentNavigation.tsx. Controls: first, previous, next, last buttons. Page input for jump. Display: 'Page X of Y'. Integrate with PDF viewer page state.
acceptance_criteria: Navigation buttons work correctly. Page display updates. Jump to page works. Current page visible.

title: Define custom error types
description: Create type-safe error classes for different API failure scenarios.
design: Directory: src/services/api/errors/. Types: ApiCallError, NotFoundError, DocumentNotFoundError, DefinitionNotFoundError, UserNotFoundError, ForbiddenError, InternalServerError. Each extends Error with status code.
acceptance_criteria: Error types can be caught and handled. Error messages are user-friendly. Status codes correct.

title: Implement FieldView for field definitions
description: Create component for defining and managing field extraction rules.
design: File: src/components/DocumentTypeForm/FieldView/FieldView.tsx. Features: Add/edit/delete fields, field name, type, validation rules.
acceptance_criteria: Can add new fields. Can edit existing fields. Can delete fields. Validation rules apply.

title: User Story 4: Table Row Detection (Verification)
description:
Verify User Story 4 implementation is complete and working.

**Story Goal**: Users can trigger table row detection for detected tables, monitor detection status with polling, and cancel in-progress detection requests.

**Tasks**:
- T018: Manual acceptance test for table row detection
- T019: Verify polling interval and error handling

**Independent Test**: Open document with detected tables, click table row detection button, verify polling mechanism updates detection results.

**Current Implementation**: Document.tsx with requestTableRowDetection(), getTableRowDetectionStatus() polling, cancelTableRowDetection().

title: Setup Phase
description: Project initialization and basic infrastructure setup including Next.js 14 configuration, TypeScript setup, Material-UI theme, Auth0 authentication, Zustand state management, next-intl internationalization, Jest testing infrastructure, and API client foundation.

title: Create DocumentTypeList page and component
description: Implement document type list page with table view and filtering.
design: Files: src/app/document-type/page.tsx (route), src/components/DocumentTypeList/DocumentTypeList.tsx (component). API: searchDocumentTypes(). Table: DocumentTypeTable with columns.
acceptance_criteria: Page accessible at /document-type. Document types display in table. Filtering works.

title: User Story 5: Manage Document Types
description: Users can create, edit, and manage document type definitions. P2 priority - configurable processing workflows.

title: Document Processing and Scanning - Existing Feature Documentation
description:
This epic documents the existing frontend document processing workflows in the Documatch application. All features are already implemented - this epic tracks documentation verification, testing, and quality assurance tasks.

**Key Components**:
- DocumentUploadDialog: File upload interface with type selection
- DocumentRescan: Re-process documents with custom grouping
- Table Row Detection: AI-powered table structure detection with polling
- Status Monitoring: Document processing status display
- Page Conversion: Two-step upload workflow
- Data Corrections: Edit extracted fields and tables

**Architecture**: Frontend-only application with direct client-side calls to TemplatelessApiV2 REST API. No backend processing layer exists.

**User Stories**:
- US1 (P1): Upload and Submit Documents - ✅ Implemented
- US2 (P1): Monitor Processing Status - ✅ Implemented
- US3 (P1): Rescan Documents with Custom Grouping - ✅ Implemented
- US4 (P2): Table Row Detection - ✅ Implemented
- US5 (P2): Process Converted Pages - ✅ Implemented
- US6 (P2): Edit Extracted Data and Corrections - ✅ Implemented

title: Manual acceptance test for whole PDF rescan
description: Test rescan workflow for treating entire PDF as one group.
design: 1. Open a processed document. 2. Click rescan button - verify DocumentRescanModal opens. 3. Select "Whole PDF as one group" strategy. 4. Select a Prompt (document type). 5. Toggle OCR setting if needed. 6. Click submit - verify loading spinner appears. 7. Verify groupDocument() is called with all pages. 8. Verify rescanDocument() is called. 9. Refresh document - verify new extracted data appears.
acceptance_criteria: Whole PDF rescan works correctly. New data is generated.

title: Setup page layout structure
description: Create app shell with Header, Sidebar, and Footer components for navigation.
design: Files: src/components/PageLayout/PageLayout.tsx (container), Header/Header.tsx (top nav), Sidebar/Sidebar.tsx (side navigation), Footer/Footer.tsx. Include navigation menu items.
acceptance_criteria: Layout renders correctly. Navigation links work. Header, sidebar, footer visible.

title: Polish Phase
description: Cross-cutting improvements and production hardening including responsive design, accessibility, performance optimization, error handling, internationalization, security, testing, and documentation.

title: Create DocumentUploadDialog component
description: Implement modal dialog for document upload with drag-and-drop zone and file selection.
design: Directory: src/components/DocumentUploadDialog/. Library: react-dropzone@14.2.10. Features: Drag-and-drop zone, file selection dialog, file name display, validation errors.
acceptance_criteria: Dialog opens from document list. Drag-and-drop works. File selection works. File name displays after selection.

title: Document Management System
description: Comprehensive web application for managing processed documents with PDF viewing, metadata editing, upload, search/filtering, document type management, and extracted data management. Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Material-UI, and Auth0. All features fully implemented on main branch - this epic documents the existing implementation.

title: Assess test coverage for DocumentUploadDialog component
description: Review existing tests for DocumentUploadDialog and identify gaps.
design: Check for src/components/DocumentUploadDialog/DocumentUploadDialog.test.tsx. Verify test coverage for: File drag-and-drop, File selection, Prompt selection, Upload submission, Error handling. Use npm test -- --coverage --collectCoverageFrom="src/components/DocumentUploadDialog/**"
acceptance_criteria: Test coverage report generated. Gaps documented with priority.

title: Assess test coverage for table row detection polling
description: Review existing tests for table row detection polling in Document component.
design: Check src/components/Document/Document.test.tsx. Verify test coverage for: requestTableRowDetection call, getTableRowDetectionStatus polling, cancelTableRowDetection, Polling state management (pollResultsForDocument ref), Error handling.
acceptance_criteria: Polling logic test coverage assessed. Edge cases documented.

title: Configure Jest and React Testing Library
description: Set up Jest with jsdom environment and React Testing Library for component testing.
design: File: jest.config.js with jsdom environment. Configure test scripts in package.json.
acceptance_criteria: Jest runs successfully. Test environment uses jsdom. Tests can be run with 'yarn test'.

title: Phase 2: Test Coverage Assessment
description:
Assess and improve test coverage for document processing workflows.

**Tasks**:
- T006: Assess test coverage for DocumentUploadDialog component
- T007: Assess test coverage for DocumentRescan workflows
- T008: Assess test coverage for table row detection polling
- T009: Assess integration test coverage for upload workflow
- T010: Generate comprehensive test coverage report

**Goal**: Identify test coverage gaps and ensure comprehensive test coverage for all document processing workflows.

title: Create user service API client
description: Implement user search and lookup API for assigning users as person in charge.
design: File: src/services/api/UserServiceApi/UserServiceApiClient.ts. Methods: searchUsers(filters), getUser(id). Return user data with id, name, email.
acceptance_criteria: Can search for users. Can fetch individual user. Used for person in charge autocomplete.

title: Foundational Phase
description: Core infrastructure that MUST complete before any user story implementation. Includes global data store, API client methods, user service, error types, API utilities, page layout structure, error handling infrastructure, and loading states.

title: Create person in charge autocomplete selector
description: Implement Autocomplete component for selecting users from organization.
design: Component: MUI Autocomplete. API: userServiceApiClient.searchUsers(). Display: User name and email. Store: personInChargeId. Allow clearing (null value).
acceptance_criteria: Autocomplete suggests users. Search by name or email. Selection saves user ID. Can clear selection.

title: Manual acceptance test for status monitoring
description: Test document status display and updates in the document list.
design: 1. Upload a document and note its ID. 2. View document list - verify status column shows "processing". 3. Wait for processing to complete (or check TemplatelessApiV2 directly). 4. Refresh the page - verify status updates to "done" (or "error" if failed). 5. Click document row - verify navigation to detail page works. 6. On detail page, verify extracted data is displayed if status is "done".
acceptance_criteria: All 4 acceptance scenarios pass. Status updates work correctly.

title: Optimize performance with code splitting and caching
description: Implement code splitting, virtual scrolling, and caching strategies.
design: Code splitting: Next.js automatic splitting. Caching: Zustand store for search results. Virtualization: MUI X DataGrid Pro for large lists.
acceptance_criteria: Code split into chunks. Search results cached. Large lists use virtual scrolling.

title: Implement document detail page route
description: Create /document/[id] route for viewing individual documents with server-side data fetching.
design: File: src/app/document/[id]/page.tsx. Use withPageAuthRequired(). Use getServerApiClient() for SSR. Fetch document by ID. Render DocumentViewer with DocumentDataStoreProvider.
acceptance_criteria: Dynamic route works. Document data fetched server-side. DocumentViewer receives data.

title: Implement upload progress tracking
description: Add progress indicator and success/error feedback during file upload.
design: Show progress bar or spinner during upload. Display success message on completion. Show error message on failure. Use notistack for notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Progress visible during upload. Success notification appears. Error notification appears on failure.

title: Create DocumentTable component with MUI DataGrid Pro
description: Implement document table with sorting, pagination, and row click navigation.
design: File: src/components/DocumentList/DocumentTable.tsx. Use MUI X DataGrid Pro. Columns: name, status, createdAt, personInCharge. Enable sorting on all columns. Implement row click to navigate to /document/[id].
acceptance_criteria: Table displays documents. Sorting works. Pagination works. Row click navigates to detail page.

title: Add filter state persistence
description: Persist filter state across page navigations and cache search results.
design: Store: Global data store (searchFilters state). Persistence: Keep filters on navigation. Cache: Store searchResults by filter combination.
acceptance_criteria: Filters persist when navigating between pages. Cache prevents redundant API calls. Clearing cache works.

title: Implement zoom controls for PDF viewer
description: Add zoom in, zoom out, fit to width, and fit to page controls.
design: Location: In DocumentHeader toolbar. Controls: zoom in (+), zoom out (-), fit to width, fit to page. Integrate with PDF.js viewer zoom state.
acceptance_criteria: Zoom in increases magnification. Zoom out decreases. Fit to width scales PDF. Fit to page scales to fit.

title: Verify polling interval and error handling
description: Test that table row detection polling works correctly and handles errors.
design: Monitor network tab - verify getTableRowDetectionStatus() is called repeatedly. Verify polling interval is approximately 3 seconds. Test with network error during polling - verify error is handled. Test with detection failure (status "error") - verify error message displayed. Test multiple rapid detections - verify polling state is managed correctly.
acceptance_criteria: Polling works as designed. Errors handled gracefully.

title: User Story 1: Upload & Submit (Verification)
description:
Verify User Story 1 implementation is complete and working.

**Story Goal**: Users upload PDF documents through the frontend upload dialog, select a document type (Prompt/Definition), and the system submits the document to TemplatelessApiV2 for AI-powered processing.

**Tasks**:
- T011: Manual acceptance test for upload workflow
- T012: Verify error handling for invalid file uploads

**Independent Test**: Upload a PDF, select Prompt, submit, and verify document is created in TemplatelessApiV2.

**Current Implementation**: DocumentUploadDialog component with drag-and-drop, Prompt selection, uploadDocument() API call.

title: User Story 7: Download and Export Documents
description: Users can download original PDF, provide feedback, and rescan failed documents. P3 priority - convenience features.

title: Verify api-contracts.md methods match TemplatelessApiV2Client
description: Cross-reference all API client methods in api-contracts.md with actual TemplatelessApiV2Client implementation.
design: Read src/services/api/TemplatelessApiV2/TemplatelessApiV2Client.ts. Verify each documented method exists with matching signature. Verify request/response formats match documentation. Document any discrepancies or missing methods.
acceptance_criteria: All API methods verified. Method signatures and contracts match.

title: Create DocumentViewer component with PDF.js
description: Implement PDF viewer component using @netsmile/page-edit-component (PDF.js wrapper).
design: File: src/components/Document/Document.tsx. Use @netsmile/page-edit-component. Features: PDF rendering, page navigation, zoom controls, thumbnail sidebar.
acceptance_criteria: PDF renders correctly. Pages load and display. Zoom controls work. Thumbnails show all pages.

title: Implement document upload API call
description: Add API method to upload PDF file to server with document type selection.
design: Method in TemplatelessApiV2Client: uploadDocument(file: File, documentTypeId: string, name?: string). Request: multipart/form-data. Return: Document object with status='processing'.
acceptance_criteria: File uploads successfully. Document created with status='processing'. Document type assigned.

title: User Story 2: Status Monitoring (Verification)
description:
Verify User Story 2 implementation is complete and working.

**Story Goal**: Users can view document processing status in the document list table and navigate to processed documents when ready.

**Tasks**:
- T013: Manual acceptance test for status monitoring
- T014: Verify status display for all status values

**Independent Test**: Upload a document, observe "processing" status, refresh page, confirm status changes to "done".

**Current Implementation**: DocumentList.DocumentTable displays status column with values: processing, done, confirmed, error.

title: User Story 6: Data Corrections (Verification)
description:
Verify User Story 6 implementation is complete and working.

**Story Goal**: Users can view extracted fields and tables from processed documents, edit incorrect values, draw correction bounding boxes, and save corrections back to TemplatelessApiV2.

**Tasks**:
- T022: Manual acceptance test for field value corrections
- T023: Manual acceptance test for bounding box corrections

**Independent Test**: Open processed document, edit extracted field value or draw correction box, save, verify corrections persist.

**Current Implementation**: ResultData component for editing, savePageCorrections() and saveGroupCorrections() API methods.

title: Manual acceptance test for field value corrections
description: Test editing extracted field values and saving corrections.
design: 1. Open a processed document with extracted fields. 2. Locate an incorrect field value. 3. Edit the field value to correct data. 4. Click save button. 5. Verify savePageCorrections() or saveGroupCorrections() is called. 6. Verify success message is displayed. 7. Reload the document - verify corrected value persists.
acceptance_criteria: Field corrections can be edited and saved successfully.

title: Create API utility functions
description: Implement shared API logic including pagination helpers and error handling utilities.
design: File: src/services/api/utils.ts. Functions: iterateSearchPages for fetching all pages, throwIfError for error handling, transformSearchFiltersToSearchParams for API params.
acceptance_criteria: Utilities work correctly. Error handling consistent. Pagination helper fetches all pages.

title: Verify data-model.md types match actual code
description: Confirm all documented types (external from TemplatelessApiV2 and internal) are used correctly in the codebase.
design: Search codebase for RawDocument usage from @netsmile/page-edit-component. Verify BoundingBox type from @nstypes/templateless. Verify internal types (DocumentGroupItem, etc.) are defined. Confirm no local database schema exists (no Prisma, no migrations).
acceptance_criteria: All type definitions verified. Missing or incorrect types documented.

title: Create DocumentTypeForm component
description: Implement form for creating and editing document type definitions.
design: File: src/components/DocumentTypeForm/DocumentTypeForm.tsx. Fields: name, description, fieldsPrompt, tablePrompt. Mode: Create or edit based on props.
acceptance_criteria: Form displays for creating new type. Form displays for editing existing type. Validation works.

title: Verify error handling for invalid file uploads
description: Test that the system correctly rejects invalid files and displays appropriate error messages.
design: Test uploading non-PDF file (e.g., .txt, .jpg) - verify rejection. Test uploading oversized file (>50MB) - verify rejection. Test uploading without selecting Prompt - verify validation error. Test upload with network disconnected - verify error handling. Verify snackbar notifications are displayed for all errors.
acceptance_criteria: All error scenarios tested. Error messages are clear and actionable.

title: User Story 6: View and Edit Extracted Data
description: Users can view extracted fields and tables, edit values, and save corrections. P2 priority - data quality control.

title: Add upload button to document list
description: Implement upload button in DocumentList toolbar to open DocumentUploadDialog.
design: Location: DocumentList component toolbar. Button: 'Upload Document' with upload icon. Opens DocumentUploadDialog on click. Controlled by organization settings (hideASRAlphaUploadUI).
acceptance_criteria: Button visible in document list. Click opens upload dialog. Respects organization settings.

title: Implement date range filter with MUI DatePickers Pro
description: Add date range picker for filtering documents by creation date.
design: Component: MUI X DatePickers Pro with AdapterLuxon. Filters: dateFrom, dateTo. Update global store on change.
acceptance_criteria: Date range picker opens. Selecting date range filters table. Can clear date range.

title: Implement responsive design for mobile and tablet
description: Add responsive breakpoints and mobile layouts using Material-UI breakpoint system.
design: Breakpoints: xs, sm, md, lg, xl. Layout: Side-by-side on desktop (lg+), stacked on mobile (xs-sm). Components: Document viewer, metadata editor, filters.
acceptance_criteria: Layout adapts to screen sizes. Mobile view stacks components. Tablet view uses appropriate spacing.

title: Configure next-intl for internationalization
description: Set up next-intl for English and Japanese language support. Configure message files and locale routing.
design: Package: next-intl@3.22.0. Create messages/ directory with en.json and ja.json. Configure next-intl in layout.tsx.
acceptance_criteria: Users can switch between English and Japanese. All UI text translated. Locale-specific routing works.

title: User Story 5: Page Conversion (Verification)
description:
Verify User Story 5 implementation is complete and working.

**Story Goal**: Users can upload PDF files that require page conversion (PDF to JPEG) and trigger processing after conversion is complete.

**Tasks**:
- T020: Manual acceptance test for page conversion workflow
- T021: Verify reprocessDocument with different settings

**Independent Test**: Create document without scanning, upload converted JPEG pages, trigger scan operation.

**Current Implementation**: TemplatelessApiV2Client methods createDocument(), addConvertedPages(), reprocessDocument(), scanDocument().

title: User Story 2: Upload and Process Documents
description: Users can upload PDF files via drag-and-drop, select document types, and track processing status. P1 priority - document ingestion entry point.

title: Implement DocumentList component
description: Create main document list component with data fetching, pagination, and state management.
design: File: src/components/DocumentList/DocumentList.tsx. Use useGlobalDataStore for state. Call apiClient.searchDocuments(). Handle loading/error states. Implement pagination controls.
acceptance_criteria: Documents display in table. Pagination works. Loading state shows. Errors handled gracefully.

title: Generate comprehensive test coverage report
description: Create a comprehensive test coverage report for all document processing workflows.
design: Run npm test -- --coverage --collectCoverageFrom="src/components/{DocumentUploadDialog,DocumentRescan,Document,DocumentList}/**". Aggregate coverage data by user story. Identify untested code paths. Prioritize missing tests by risk and user impact.
acceptance_criteria: Coverage report generated with recommendations for improvement.

title: Setup API client infrastructure
description: Create base API client with authentication and error handling. Define TypeScript types for API responses.
design: Directory: src/services/api/. Files: TemplatelessApiV2Client.ts, UserServiceApiClient.ts, errors/, types.ts, utils.ts. Implement Bearer token authentication.
acceptance_criteria: API client communicates with backend. Authentication works. Errors handled gracefully. Types are correct.

title: Implement document search and retrieval API methods
description: Add API client methods for searching documents and fetching individual documents.
design: Methods in TemplatelessApiV2Client: searchDocuments(filters, sorting, page, pageSize), getDocument(id). Implement pagination, filtering, and sorting logic. Return SearchResults<RawDocument> type.
acceptance_criteria: Can search documents with filters. Can fetch single document by ID. Pagination works correctly.

title: Add document download functionality
description: Implement download button and API call to download original PDF.
design: Method: apiClient.getDocumentDownloadUrl(id). Button: In DocumentHeader toolbar. Action: Browser downloads file from signed URL.
acceptance_criteria: Download button visible in toolbar. Click downloads PDF file. File has correct name.

title: Add unsaved changes warning dialog
description: Implement confirmation dialog when navigating away with unsaved changes.
design: Trigger: Navigation or page close with dirty state. UI: Confirmation dialog with 'Stay' and 'Leave' buttons. State: Track dirty flag in document store.
acceptance_criteria: Dialog appears on navigation with unsaved changes. 'Stay' keeps user on page. 'Leave' discards changes and navigates.

title: Create global data store with Zustand
description: Implement global state management store for search filters, pagination, sorting, and document caching.
design: File: src/providers/global-data-store-provider.tsx. Define state interface: searchFilters, page, rowsPerPage, sortColumn, sortDirection, searchResults cache. Actions: setSearchFilters, setPage, setRowsPerPage, setSortColumn, setSortDirection, setSearchResults, resetSearchResults.
acceptance_criteria: Store accessible via useGlobalDataStore hook. State updates correctly. Cache persists search results by page.

title: Assess integration test coverage for upload workflow
description: Verify integration tests exist for complete upload → status → view workflow.
design: Search for integration tests covering upload workflow. Verify tests cover: Upload via DocumentUploadDialog, Status retrieval via searchDocuments, Document navigation to detail page, Extracted data display.
acceptance_criteria: Integration test coverage documented. Missing workflows identified.

title: Phase 9: Polish & Documentation
description:
Finalize documentation, create developer guides, and ensure code quality.

**Tasks**:
- T024: Update inline code documentation
- T025: Create component usage examples
- T026: Run ESLint and fix issues
- T027: Create troubleshooting guide

**Goal**: Complete documentation, improve code quality, and create troubleshooting resources for developers.

title: Create troubleshooting guide
description: Document common issues and solutions for document processing workflows.
design: Document common upload errors and solutions. Document rescan failure scenarios. Document table row detection issues. Add troubleshooting section to quickstart.md.
acceptance_criteria: Troubleshooting guide covers common issues.

title: Implement file validation for uploads
description: Add PDF file type validation and file size limits with user-friendly error messages.
design: Validation in DocumentUploadDialog: Check file.mime_type === 'application/pdf'. Check file.size < 50MB. Show error message for invalid files. Keep dialog open for correction.
acceptance_criteria: Non-PDF files rejected with error. Oversized files rejected with error. Error messages are user-friendly. Dialog remains open.

title: User Story 4: Search and Filter Documents
description: Users can search by name, filter by status and date range, sort results. P2 priority - enhances document discovery.

title: Phase 1: Documentation Verification
description:
Verify all documentation accurately reflects the existing codebase.

**Tasks**:
- T001: Verify spec.md user stories match codebase implementation
- T002: Verify research.md architectural decisions match implementation
- T003: Verify data-model.md types match actual code
- T004: Verify api-contracts.md methods match TemplatelessApiV2Client
- T005: Verify quickstart.md examples work with actual codebase

**Goal**: Ensure all 6 user stories, architectural decisions, data types, API contracts, and developer guide accurately document the existing frontend implementation.

title: Improve accessibility (keyboard, screen readers, ARIA)
description: Add keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, and semantic HTML for accessibility.
design: Keyboard: Tab order, focus management, Enter/Space for actions. Screen readers: ARIA labels, semantic HTML (nav, main). Color: WCAG AA contrast.
acceptance_criteria: All actions keyboard accessible. Focus visible. ARIA labels present. Semantic HTML used.

title: Implement text search filter
description: Add TextField for searching documents by name.
design: Component: TextField with search icon. Filter: searchText param (contains, case-insensitive). Update global store on change. Debounce API calls.
acceptance_criteria: TextField accepts search text. Table filters by document name. Search is case-insensitive.

title: Implement document name editing
description: Add editable TextField for document name with validation.
design: Component: TextField in DocumentHeader. Props: value, onChange, error, helperText. Validation: Required, non-empty. Enable save button when changed.
acceptance_criteria: TextField accepts text input. Validation works for empty strings. Save button enables on change.

title: Setup Zustand state management
description: Create global state management with Zustand for search filters, pagination, and document caching.
design: Package: zustand@5.0.0. File: src/providers/global-data-store-provider.tsx with store definition.
acceptance_criteria: Zustand store accessible. State persists across components. Actions update state correctly.

title: Verify status display for all status values
description: Test that all status values (processing, done, confirmed, error) are displayed correctly.
design: Find or create documents in each status state. Verify status column displays each status correctly. Verify status icons or color coding (if implemented). Check accessibility (screen reader announces status).
acceptance_criteria: All status values display correctly. Accessibility verified.

title: User Story 3: Edit Document Metadata
description: Users can edit document name, person in charge, and save changes. P1 priority - essential for document organization.

title: Create component usage examples
description: Add usage examples to quickstart.md for common workflows.
design: Document how to use DocumentUploadDialog in other components. Document how to trigger rescan programmatically. Document how to implement custom polling patterns. Add code snippets for each workflow.
acceptance_criteria: quickstart.md has comprehensive usage examples.

title: Verify quickstart.md examples work with actual codebase
description: Test all code examples in quickstart.md to ensure they are accurate and runnable.
design: Follow each task in quickstart.md. Verify file paths exist. Verify code snippets are accurate. Test import statements. Verify component examples match actual implementations.
acceptance_criteria: All quickstart examples verified as accurate. Corrections made if needed.

title: Create ResultData components for extracted data
description: Implement container and display components for extracted fields and tables.
design: Directory: src/components/ResultData/. Components: FieldView (fields), TableView (tables). Location: Section below document viewer.
acceptance_criteria: ResultData section displays below viewer. Fields show with labels and values. Tables show with rows and columns.

title: Configure TypeScript with strict mode
description: Set up TypeScript configuration with strict mode enabled for type safety. Create type definitions directory in src/types/.
design: File: tsconfig.json with 'strict': true. Create src/types/ directory for shared type definitions.
acceptance_criteria: TypeScript compiler runs without errors. Type checking catches type errors at compile time.

title: Implement rescan functionality for failed documents
description: Add rescan button and modal to re-queue failed documents for processing.
design: Component: RescanModal. Method: apiClient.rescanDocument(id). Button: Visible for error status. Action: Re-queue document, reset status to 'processing'.
acceptance_criteria: Rescan button appears for error status. Click opens confirmation modal. Rescan resets status to processing.

title: Create DefinitionSelect component for document type selection
description: Implement dropdown to select document type definition for processing.
design: File: src/components/DocumentUploadDialog/DefinitionSelect.tsx. Fetch available document types from API. Display in select dropdown. Store selected document type ID.
acceptance_criteria: Dropdown shows available document types. Selection saved. Document type required for upload.

title: Create loading states and spinners
description: Implement loading indicator components for async operations.
design: Directory: src/components/Loaders/. Components: OverlaySpinner (full screen), Linear (progress bar), Spinner (inline). Used during API calls and page transitions.
acceptance_criteria: Loading indicators appear during async operations. Spinners animate correctly. Progress bars show loading state.

title: Generate comprehensive test coverage report
description: Create a comprehensive test coverage report for all document processing workflows.
design: Run npm test -- --coverage --collectCoverageFrom="src/components/{DocumentUploadDialog,DocumentRescan,Document,DocumentList}/**". Aggregate coverage data by user story. Identify untested code paths. Prioritize missing tests by risk and user impact.
acceptance_criteria: Coverage report generated with recommendations for improvement.

title: Initialize Next.js 14 project with App Router
description: Create Next.js 14 project with TypeScript and App Router structure. Set up src/app/ directory with page.tsx and layout.tsx files. Install and configure next@14.2.15, react@18.3.1, typescript@5.6.
design: File structure: src/app/page.tsx, src/app/layout.tsx. Use App Router pattern with file-based routing. Configure tsconfig.json with strict mode enabled.
acceptance_criteria: Next.js project runs successfully with 'yarn dev'. App Router routes work. TypeScript compilation succeeds.

title: Manual acceptance test for page conversion workflow
description: Test two-step upload workflow (create → add pages → scan).
design: 1. Call createDocument() without scanMode - verify document created without processing. 2. Prepare JPEG page images. 3. Call addConvertedPages() with JPEG files - verify pages are added. 4. Call scanDocument() - verify processing starts. 5. Verify document status changes to "processing". 6. Wait for completion - verify status changes to "done".
acceptance_criteria: Page conversion workflow works end-to-end.

title: Add clear filters button
description: Implement button to reset all filters to default state.
design: Button: 'Clear Filters' in filter toolbar. Action: Reset all filters in global store. Re-fetch documents with cleared filters.
acceptance_criteria: Button resets all filters. Table shows all documents. Filters cleared from UI.

title: Verify spec.md user stories match codebase implementation
description: Review each user story in spec.md and verify all acceptance scenarios are implemented in the codebase. Confirm components, API methods, and workflows exist as documented.
design:
Cross-reference spec.md user stories with actual component files. For each story:
- US1: Check src/components/DocumentUploadDialog/ exists and implements upload flow
- US2: Check src/components/DocumentList/DocumentTable.tsx displays status
- US3: Check src/components/DocumentRescan/ components exist
- US4: Check src/components/Document/Document.tsx implements table row detection polling
- US5: Check TemplatelessApiV2Client has page conversion methods
- US6: Check src/components/ResultData/ exists for data editing
acceptance_criteria: All 6 user stories verified as implemented. Discrepancies documented (if any).

title: Assess test coverage for DocumentRescan workflows
description: Review existing tests for DocumentRescan components and handler functions.
design: Check for tests in src/components/DocumentRescan/. Verify test coverage for: DocumentRescanModal interactions, Custom grouping workflow, Handler functions (treatWholePdfAsOneGroup, etc.), Concurrent processing with PromisePool, Error handling.
acceptance_criteria: Test coverage report generated. Missing test scenarios documented.

title: Configure error handling infrastructure
description: Create error page components and notification system for user-facing error messages.
design: Components: ErrorPage variants (404, 403, ConnectionError, GeneralError). Library: notistack for snackbar notifications. Add error logging to console with context.
acceptance_criteria: Error pages display correctly. Notifications appear for API errors. Console logging works.

title: Verify rescan error handling
description: Test error handling in rescan workflows.
design: Attempt rescan on document with invalid Prompt. Test rescan with network disconnected. Test concurrent rescan with multiple groups - verify one failure doesn't stop others. Verify error messages are displayed via snackbar.
acceptance_criteria: All error scenarios handled gracefully. Users can retry.

title: Run ESLint and fix issues
description: Ensure all document processing code passes ESLint checks.
design: Run npm run lint -- src/components/DocumentUploadDialog src/components/DocumentRescan src/components/Document. Review and fix any linting errors. Ensure consistent code style.
acceptance_criteria: All linting errors resolved. Code follows Airbnb style guide.

title: Setup Material-UI theme and providers
description: Configure Material-UI 6 theme and providers in root layout. Install MUI 6.1.4 with Pro extensions.
design: File: src/app/layout.tsx with MUI CacheProvider and ThemeProvider. Create custom theme configuration.
acceptance_criteria: Material-UI components render correctly. Theme applies globally. Pro components work.

title: Add status filter with multi-select
description: Implement multi-select dropdown for filtering by document status.
design: Component: MUI Select or Checkbox group. Options: processing, done, confirmed, error. Multiple selections allowed. Update global store.
acceptance_criteria: Dropdown shows all status options. Can select multiple statuses. Filter applies to table.

title: Manual acceptance test for custom grouping rescan
description: Test rescan workflow with custom page range grouping.
design: 1. Open a processed document with multiple pages. 2. Click rescan button. 3. Select "Custom grouping" strategy. 4. Define page ranges (e.g., pages 1-3, 4-6). 5. Select different Prompts for each range. 6. Click submit. 7. Verify groups are created correctly. 8. Verify concurrent rescan with PromisePool (max 5 concurrent). 9. Refresh document - verify each group processed with its Prompt.
acceptance_criteria: Custom grouping rescan works. Concurrent processing verified.

title: Add thumbnail sidebar for page navigation
description: Implement page thumbnail sidebar for quick navigation to specific pages.
design: Component: DocumentThumbnails (from page-edit-component). Position: Left sidebar of viewer. Features: Page thumbnails, click to jump to page, highlight current page.
acceptance_criteria: Thumbnails display for all pages. Click thumbnail jumps to page. Current page highlighted.

title: User Story 1: View and Navigate Documents
description: Users can browse document list, view PDFs with page navigation, zoom controls, and thumbnails. P1 priority - core value proposition.

title: Manual acceptance test for bounding box corrections
description: Test drawing correction bounding boxes and saving.
design: 1. Open a document with extraction errors. 2. Use bounding box tool to draw correction box around missed field. 3. Save corrections. 4. Verify correction data is sent to TemplatelessApiV2. 5. Reload document - verify correction is persisted.
acceptance_criteria: Bounding box corrections work and persist.

title: Manual acceptance test for table row detection
description: Test complete table row detection workflow with polling.
design: 1. Open a document with detected tables. 2. Click table row detection button. 3. Verify requestTableRowDetection() is called with table bounding boxes. 4. Verify requestId is returned. 5. Observe loading spinner - verify polling is active. 6. Wait for polling to complete (status changes from "pending" to "done"). 7. Verify detected rows are displayed in the UI. 8. Test cancel button during detection - verify cancelTableRowDetection() is called.
acceptance_criteria: Table row detection works correctly. Polling updates UI. Cancel works.

title: Implement save and cancel functionality for metadata
description: Add API call to save changes and cancel action to discard unsaved changes.
design: Save: apiClient.updateDocument(id, {name, personInChargeId}). Cancel: Restore original values, clear edit mode. Show success/error notifications.
acceptance_criteria: Save persists changes to API. Cancel discards changes. Success notification on save. Error notification on failure.

title: Add document state management provider
description: Create Zustand store for document-specific state (current document, loading, error).
design: File: src/providers/document-data-store-provider.tsx. State: document, loading, error. Actions: setDocument, setLoading, setError. Provider wraps document detail page.
acceptance_criteria: Document state accessible. Loading state works. Error handling works. Provider wraps children correctly.

title: Create DocumentFilters component
description: Implement filter controls above document table for search, status, and date range.
design: File: src/components/DocumentList/DoumentFilters.tsx. Layout: Toolbar above DocumentTable. Components: Search TextField, Status multi-select, DateRangePicker.
acceptance_criteria: Filters display above table. All filter controls visible. Layout responsive.

title: Create DocumentList page route
description: Implement /document route with authentication and document list component.
design: File: src/app/document/page.tsx. Use withPageAuthRequired() HOC. Render DocumentList component. Route: /document.
acceptance_criteria: Page accessible only when authenticated. DocumentList component renders. Navigation works.

title: Verify research.md architectural decisions match implementation
description: Confirm all 8 architectural decisions in research.md accurately describe the codebase architecture.
design:
For each decision in research.md:
- Verify frontend-only architecture (no backend API routes for processing)
- Verify TemplatelessApiV2Client usage pattern
- Verify component-based workflow orchestration
- Verify no local database exists
- Verify polling only for table row detection
- Verify rescan strategy pattern in handler.ts
- Verify error handling with snackbar notifications
- Verify test files exist for components
acceptance_criteria: All architectural decisions verified. Any deviations documented.
